markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tactical Cadence](/Feats.aspx?ID=2016) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 181 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=66)

**Prerequisites**
[Cadence Call](/Feats.aspx?ID=2010)

</column>

---

Your remarkable breath control and concise instructions allow you to coordinate your allies more effectively. When you grant allies the [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) condition using [Cadence Call](/Feats.aspx?ID=2010), they can use the extra action to either Stride or Strike, and they aren't [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) on their following turn if they use the extra action.
name: Tactical Cadence
